item.title: Using consul as a registry for istio(intree or by service entry)
item.description: registry By default istio uses k8s as registry, k8s service, endpoint corresponds to service, instance. For some Spring Cloud services that are not yet connected to the Service Grid, the registry they use may be consul, how to make the Consumer service on the Service Grid to access the non-Service Grid Provider is a problem faced by the application during the Service Grid migration. istio itself provides some mechanisms to bring in external registries of services.
